title: (DVD)(Kubrick) The Shining (1980)
description:
info:
another high-bitrate DivX rip; intended to provide minimal degradation with decent compression. although it is known that Vivian Kubrick made a documentary about it, I was unable to properly rip it.

system requirements:
1.3 Ghz processor, 32 MB graphics card ; 5.1 speakers highly recommended.

seeding:
only this week; possibly sometimes later. get it while it&#039;s hot!

credo:
"I know you&#039;re out there. I can feel you now. I know that you&#039;re afraid, you&#039;re afraid of us, you&#039;re afraid of change. I don&#039;t know the future. I didn&#039;t came here to tell you how this is going to end. I came here to tell you how it&#039;s going to begin.

I&#039;m going to hang up this phone and then I&#039;m going to show these people what you don&#039;t want them to see. I&#039;m going to show them a world without you, a world without rules and controls, without borders or boundaries, a world, where anything is possible. Where we go from there, this is a choice I leave to you."		ssible. Where we go from there, this is a choice I leave to you."	

Enjoy ;-)
